yīng
to agree (to do sth); should; ought to; must; (legal) shall
соглашаться (делать что-то); должен; должен; должен; (юридический) должен

yìng
to answer; to respond; to comply with; to deal or cope with
отвечать; ответить; соблюдать; иметь дело или справляться с

heisig_chinese_memo: She sent me on a wild goose chase, leading me on, and broke my heart. I really ought to get more street smart.
Ru_trainchinese:
yīng: (глаг) должен, следует; обещать, соглашаться
yìng: (глаг) отвечать; принимать (приглашение); подходить, соответствовать; исполняться, подтверждаться
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a wild goose (䧹) in your heart (心) would satisfy you
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: You ought to be careful and tiptoe on the cave floor so as not to awaken the angry owl.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " heart " and " 𨿳 ", the original meaning is should and should. "Said Wen": "Dang Ye. From the heart, 𨿳 sound." "Poetry‧ Zhou Song‧ Lai": "The King of Wen is diligent, I deserve it." Mao Chuan: "Yes, be."

" Should " be represented yes. "Zhuangzi's Fables": "If you agree with yourself, you will respond. If you don't agree with yourself, you will oppose it."

" Should " can mean all, all. Song Suzhe "Re-discussion of the Water Tank in the West of Beijing": "The land that should be withdrawn is allocated to the owner; the land occupied by the water is returned to the official land."

" Ying " can also be used as an adverb. Han Wangchong's "Lun Heng‧ Sense of Void": "Or when the King Yan is easy to use punishment, the cold should come."

" Should " can mean accept. "Guan Zi‧ Xiao Kuang": "Ying Gong’s gift, killing the Yellow Spring, dead and immortal."

" Ying " also means answering and answering. "Zhuangzi Lieyu Kou": "Or hired by Zhuangzi. Zhuangzi responded to his envoy and said: "Is my husband sacrificed a cow?""

" Ying " also means promise and promise. "New Odes to the Jade Terrace, Ancient Poems Written by Jiao Zhongqing's Wife": "A mother said that A daughter: "You can go and respond.""

" Ying " also means to agree. "Yi‧Qian": "Same voice and corresponding, same spirit."

" Shall " also refers to conformity, adaptation, and compliance. "Zhuangzi‧ Horseshoe": "The music player hits the hook, the straight person responds to the rope."

" Should " also means to deal with and deal with. "Zhuangzi·Qiwu Lun": "The pivot must be in its ring, so as to respond to infinity."

" Accept " also means induction and fulfillment. "Mandarin-Yue Yu": "The heavens should be over, and the personnel are not exhausted. Aunt Wang will wait for them."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " heart " and " 𨿳 ", the original meaning is should and should.
humanum_full_description:
從「心」，「𨿳」聲，本義為應當、應該。《說文》：「當也。从心，𨿳聲。」《詩‧周頌‧賚》：「文王既勤止，我應受之。」毛傳：「應，當。」

　　「應」可表示是。《莊子‧寓言》：「與己同則應，不輿己同則反。」成玄英疏：「與己同見則應而為是。」

　　「應」可表示所有、全部。宋蘇轍〈再論京西水櫃狀〉：「應退出地皆撥還本主；應水占地皆以官地對還。」

　　「應」還可用作副詞。漢王充《論衡‧感虛》：「或時燕王好用刑，寒氣應至。」

　　「應」可指接受。《管子‧小匡》：「應公之賜，殺之黃泉，死且不朽。」

　　「應」也表示應聲、回答。《莊子‧列禦寇》：「或聘於莊子。莊子應其使曰：『子見夫犧牛乎？』」

　　「應」還表示應允、許諾。《玉臺新詠‧古詩為焦仲卿妻作》：「阿母謂阿女：『汝可去應之。』」

　　「應」亦表示應和。《易‧乾》：「同聲相應，同氣相求。」

　　「應」還指符合、適應、順應。《莊子‧馬蹄》：「曲者中鉤，直者應繩。」

　　「應」亦表示應付、對付。《莊子‧齊物論》：「樞始得其環中，以應無窮。」

　　「應」也表示感應、應驗。《國語‧越語下》：「天應至矣，人事未盡也，王姑待之。」
humanum_short_description: 從「心」，「𨿳」聲，本義為應當、應該。

①該，當，又引申料想理該如此：應當。應該。應分(fèn)。應有盡有。
②回答：答應。喊他不應。應承。
③隨，即：“桓督諸將周旋赴討，應皆平定”。
④姓氏。

①回答或隨聲相和：應答。呼應。應對(答對)。應和。反應(ａ．化學上指物質發生化學變化，產生性質和成分與原來不同的新物質；b．人和動物受到刺激而發生的活動和變化；c．迴響，反響)。
②接受，允許，答應要求：應邀。應聘。應考。
③順合，適合：順應。適應。應機。應景。應時。應用文。
④對待：應付。應變。應酬。
⑤當該。

從「 心 」，「 𨿳 」聲，本義為應當、應該。《說文》：「當也。从心，𨿳聲。」《詩‧周頌‧賚》：「文王既勤止，我應受之。」毛傳：「應，當。」 「 應 」可表示是。《莊子‧寓言》：「與己同則應，不輿己同則反。」成玄英疏：「與己同見則應而為是。」 「 應 」可表示所有、全部。宋蘇轍〈再論京西水櫃狀〉：「應退出地皆撥還本主；應水占地皆以官地對還。」 「 應 」還可用作副詞。漢王充《論衡‧感虛》：「或時燕王好用刑，寒氣應至。」 「 應 」可指接受。《管子‧小匡》：「應公之賜，殺之黃泉，死且不朽。」 「 應 」也表示應聲、回答。《莊子‧列禦寇》：「或聘於莊子。莊子應其使曰：『子見夫犧牛乎？』」 「 應 」還表示應允、許諾。《玉臺新詠‧古詩為焦仲卿妻作》：「阿母謂阿女：『汝可去應之。』」 「 應 」亦表示應和。《易‧乾》：「同聲相應，同氣相求。」 「 應 」還指符合、適應、順應。《莊子‧馬蹄》：「曲者中鉤，直者應繩。」 「 應 」亦表示應付、對付。《莊子‧齊物論》：「樞始得其環中，以應無窮。」 「 應 」也表示感應、應驗。《國語‧越語下》：「天應至矣，人事未盡也，王姑待之。」
From the sound of " heart" and " 𨿳", the original meaning is should and should. "Said Wen": "Dang Ye. From the heart, 𨿳 sound." "Poetry‧ Zhou Song‧ Lai": "The King of Wen is diligent, I deserve it." Mao Chuan: "Yes, be." " Should" be represented yes. "Zhuangzi's Fables": "If you agree with yourself, you will respond. If you don't agree with yourself, you will oppose it." " Should" can mean all, all. Song Suzhe "Re-discussion of the Water Tank in the West of Beijing": "The land that should be withdrawn is allocated to the owner; the land occupied by the water is returned to the official land." " Ying" can also be used as an adverb. Han Wangchong's "Lun Heng‧ Sense of Void": "Or when the King Yan is easy to use punishment, the cold should come." " Should" can mean accept. "Guan Zi‧ Xiao Kuang": "Ying Gong’s gift, killing the Yellow Spring, dead and immortal." " Ying" also means answering and answering. "Zhuangzi Lieyu Kou": "Or hired by Zhuangzi. Zhuangzi responded to his envoy and said: "Is my husband sacrificed a cow?"" " Ying" also means promise and promise. "New Odes to the Jade Terrace, Ancient Poems Written by Jiao Zhongqing's Wife": "A mother said that A daughter: "You can go and respond."" " Ying" also means to agree. "Yi‧Qian": "Same voice and corresponding, same spirit." " Shall" also refers to conformity, adaptation, and compliance. "Zhuangzi‧ Horseshoe": "The music player hits the hook, the straight person responds to the rope." " Should" also means to deal with and deal with. "Zhuangzi·Qiwu Lun": "The pivot must be in its ring, so as to respond to infinity." " Accept" also means induction and fulfillment. "Mandarin-Yue Yu": "The heavens should be over, and the personnel are not exhausted. Aunt Wang will wait for them."

應字的基本解释

應
yīng

應
yìng
均见“应”。

應字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yīng］
［《廣韻》於陵切，平蒸，影。］
“应1”的繁体字。
(1)应当，应该。
(2)认为是；是。
(3)所有，全部。
(4)副词。表示动作、行为是立即进行的。相当于“很快”、“立即”。
(5)副词。表示料想之词。犹恐怕、大概。
(6)副词。犹曾；须。多与“不”或“未”连用。
(7)犹顾，知。
(8)通“膺”。当，判处。
(9)古国名。在今河南省鲁山县东。
(10)姓。
[②]［yìng］
［《廣韻》於證切，去證，影。］
“应2”的繁体字。
(1)受；接受。
(2)应声，回答。
(3)应允；许诺。
(4)应和。
(5)响应。
(6)符合；适应；顺应。
(7)指照应。
(8)应付；对付。
(9)支付；供给。
(10)感应；应验。
(11)迎击。
(12)古乐器名。小鼓。
(13)同“雁”。参见“應2步”。
(14)通“颜”。参见“應2行”。

應字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　應； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页405第21
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?於陵切，音膺。【說文】當也。从心?聲。【徐曰】?，鷹字也。本作?，今作應。　又料度辭也。【唐詩】應須，祇應，皆是也。　又【周語】其叔父實應且憎。【註】猶受也。　又國名。【括地志】故應城，因應山爲名，在汝州葉縣。　又姓。出南頓，本周武王後。【左傳·僖二十四年】邗晉應韓，武之穆也。漢有應曜，與四皓偕隱，曜獨不出，八代孫應劭，集解漢書。　又通作膺。【書·武成】誕膺天命。【註】當也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?於證切，音譍。【集韻】答也。【廣韻】物相應也。【易·咸卦】二氣感應以相與。　又樂名。【周禮·春官·笙師應樂註】應長六尺五寸，象柷，有椎連底，左右相擊，以應柷也。【樂書】應樂，猶鷹之應物，其獲也小，故小鼓小舂謂之應，所以應大也。小鼙曰應鼓。【周禮·春官·小師】擊應鼓。【註】鼙也。　又天子之門曰應門。【詩·大雅】廼立應門。【註】正門也。　又州名。鴈門地，唐置應州。　又叶於容切，音雍。【易·蒙卦】童蒙求我，志應

should
Basic explanation of words
should
yīng
should
yìng
See "should".
should
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yīng］
["Guangyun" Yuling cut, flat steamed, shadow. ]
Traditional characters of "应1".
(1) Yes, yes.
(2) Think yes; yes.
(3) All, all.
(4) Adverbs. Indicates that the action and behavior are carried out immediately. Equivalent to "soon" and "immediately".
(5) Adverbs. A word that expresses expectations. I'm afraid, probably.
(6) Adverbs. You have; to be. It is often used in conjunction with "no" or "未".
(7) Hesitate to care and know.
(8) Through "fake". When, sentenced.
(9) Ancient country name. In today's east of Lushan County, Henan Province.
(10) Last name.
[②]［yìng］
["Guang Yun" in the proof cut, go to proof, and film. ]
The traditional characters of "应2".
(1) Accept; Accept.
(2) Respond and answer.
(3) Accepted; promised.
(4) Correspondence.
(5) Response.
(6) Conformity; Adaptation; Adaptation.
(7) Refers to anaphora.
(8) To deal with; to deal with.
(9) Payment; supply.
(10) Induction; fulfilled.
(11) Face off.
(12) The name of the ancient musical instrument. Snare drum.
(13) Same as "Goose". See "Should be 2 steps".
(14) Through "Yan". See "should be 2 rows".
should
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　ying; Kangxi strokes: 17; page number: page 405 21
